title: Crypto (without the hype): how it's different, and why it's risky

questions.prompt: Crypto differs from a stock because:

choices.text: It doesn't represent a company or a loan

questions.explanation: Its valuation relies more on adoption/usage/liquidity/regulation than on a company's cash flows.

questions.prompt: A major specific risk in crypto is:
questions.explanation: Custody (self-custody or platform) introduces risks not found in most ETFs.

questions.prompt: True/False: crypto volatility is generally low.
questions.explanation: Historically, cryptocurrencies have been highly volatile (fast and large price swings).

choices.text: It can change access, taxation, or liquidity

questions.explanation: Regulatory changes can significantly affect the market and platforms.

questions.prompt: In Limpid, the stance on crypto is:
questions.explanation: Limpid aims for understanding (exposure, risks, sources), not recommendations.
